name: Space Farmers
description: Grab a friend, grab a gadget, grab a gun and get ready for the most fun you'll ever have in a co-op game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and above Processor: 1.5ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 or above Compatible Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Anything that makes a noise! Additional Notes: Broadband Internet Connection Required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Professional Processor: Multi Core AMD or Intel 2.5ghz+ Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 or above Compatible Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Broadband Internet Connection Required

reviews.review_text: This game is fantastic, there is so much to do and if you are looking for some fun Co-op game play, you found it. I adore this game and I will be damned if I can't get by the bomb hats levels. Get it quick and get ready for some fun :)

I've been playing the alpha and this is a blast. It's not just a coop where you play together, it's a coop where you play AND work together! It's a blast. Fun levels, easy enough for younger/novice players to pick up easily and can get complex exough for some more mature players to knock their heads against the keyboard.

I love this game!  Its fun, fast paced and the graphics are so awesome!  I found the devs at insomnia and won their competition to design a character. They where friendly to chat to as well.  It's really fun to play, just slightly annoying occasionally when there's no one to play with.  I'd really reccomend this game to anyone though. It's hillarious, very fun and the levels are incredibly well designed.

Awesome game!!! :) -First of all there are many cool accersories for your character -and there are awesome guns -The Graphics are fantabulos! -Fantastic gadgets and equiments! -Amazing Cartoon style graphic! :)

Space Farmers is a very interesting game, but serious issues plague what could be a great fantastic co op game.  The game is basically a two player co op game where you play as two farmers who try to escape a space ship, by completing tons of goals.  The game consists of 30 levels which you can pick any of them to complete. After the first 10 random levels you can pick any route you want, since you can only do 5 levels per route.  The gameplay consists of you trying to solve with your friend and trust me you will need someone with a mic that you can talk to, cause you will need someone to figure out the puzzles with.  The puzzles range from trying to get to the end of the level by activating switches, killing robots with different weapons and gadgets. They very from shotguns to pistols, to explosives, you also have gadgets like jetpacks, x ray glasses and torches.  The game is incredibly fun with a friend, but there is also a lot of bad.  The controls are for the most part really fluid, but there are some bits that are incredibly annoying to control ( you will know once you see it).  First of all the soundtrack is atrocious. It really hurts the ears while you're playing, overall the audio design is really mediocre, not to mention when talking on skype or through any other software it's gonna be incredibly hard to hear what your friend has to say, cause even then the sound is way too loud.  The game also has some level design issues. Like some really hard stuff. Now hard stuff isn't bad, but some of the stuff in the game is incredibly unfair.   The game took me 4 hours to finish. There is some replay value to do the extra achievements and there's also a challenge room to test your skills.  Overall do I recommend Space Farmers ? For the full price no, but once it goes on sale definitely give it a try and give the second copy to your friend and have yourself a good ol time.  Pros: +Great puzzles +Fun Gameplay +Good Co Op  Cons: -Terrible music -Clunky controls    Final Rating: 7/10  If you liked this review please consider giving it a thumbs up and if you disliked post in the comments on what you disliked about the review.  For more reviews follow Snort's Review curator page  here  - follow for regular updates on reviews for other games!

I've played two sets of Challenge levels. I can't judge the rest of the levels but so far I think I've seen enough of the game to understand how it plays. Solid execution of a puzzle game with poor visual appearance, preventing many from seeing how good this game is. 8/10 due to low replay value, not attractive art style, and not reliable for online play.  Pros: - The game requires two player effort: Some games that claim it utilizes co-op for it's level design don't usually need a second player. This one has at least 7 out of the 10 levels I tried that truly needs two players to work together or else either one cannot complete the level. My favorite was a level where each player has a bomb on their head and is timed to blow up after 10 seconds. Each player has to deactivate traps in sequence and even time when they pick up a timer power up to reset the bomb timer. It was a blast trying it.  - Variety in level challenge: Out of the 10 I've played, me and a friend played a level where we did an arena shooter where monsters spawned randomly and random dangers launched projectiles. We played a level where we had to guide a dinosaur across the level using a mobile cookie maker. Another level had me flying through active danger while my buddy shot at the enemy, effectively making me a decoy for the level.  - Cool Co-Op oriented weapons: One level I did used had a weapon that was a detonator while the other player launched potato mines. Another was a time me and another player used laser beam weapons where they are extremely powerful, but can kill each other if the laser touched us. Very cool stuff.  Cons  - Not appealing graphics: Passable art style, but was a major factor for most of my friends to not play it. Only by trying it when we were bored and deciding what to play did we play this. Makes the game look like it passed the Greenlight barrier because of the game being given away by the Dev, even though it wasn't.  - Requires a good internet connection for online play: I was able to play with 1 of 3 friends while we tried to get it running. The other 2 don't have the best connection, roughly broadband quality in their region of the world, so be weary when trying to play with online friends. Split Screen worked perfectly.
A fantastic Co-op game, I had the pleasure of playing this at Insomnia51. It's been hilarious running through more levels with some friends! I definitely reccommend playing it!

Nice game but you can only play with someone if u take online it will be search and search if u take a singly yo will need to play on keyboard or controller :/   7/10 it will be nice if they make singly and you play only

What.the.♥♥♥♥ man this game is like a ♥♥♥♥ing fever dream. We didn't even finish the game yet because of that stupid ♥♥♥♥ing gas, lazer, time bomb, grinder ♥♥♥♥ man it feel so heavily relied on RNG. I don't know man I was gifted this game by a friend and my god is it something. Fun to play with friends, ruins relationships and lives.

A very fun 2 player coop game. Every level in it is different. Different weapons, puzzles, challenges, obstacles. Each lvl is a new experience basically. Although it looks simple, a lot of thought and well executed work went in to this game. The developers were far from lazy.  Just make sure you have a friend to play it with or find someone online before you buy it, because random in game matchmaking isn't working so good. Your coop partner should be from your Steam friends list.
I like this game. It is fun with friends and it is just the right ammount of difficult. 5/5
There is huge issue with this game it is dependent on multiplayer that is currently dead . If they added more single player maps and content I wouldn't mind at all...

A two player CO-OP game that I found to be enjoyable, though it was short.  The game has you solving puzzles with your friend and trying to get to a portal at the end, using shotguns, laser beams, gravity gloves and all kind of gadgets.   The game looks like something unfinished, and it kinda felt like it, but it plays well enough. Sometimes I was even suprised how little there was to complain about bugs, since there really weren't any that I noticed. Though, the enemies could have used some tweaking on their attacks hitting.  Would I recommend this? Yes, expecially if you're planning on letting kids play this, since none of the puzzles are too hard, are short enough to finish fast and are quite fun. I would however suggest buying it on a sale as I feel that 9,99€ for it is a bit too much.
I didnt expect much from this game but I actually enjoy playing this game! pretty fun and simple game

Really fun co-op puzzle game with great soundtracks. Problem is that your character moves slow, and when either you or your friend died you start from check points(results in wasting a lot of time just to run back to where you died).  6/10

What happens when you abduct two British fellas onto a spaceship and then abandon in like the French when the first invaders start infesting it? Well, you're depriving those two Brits from the pleasure of their tea so I guess they'll break out and try getting the f*** outta there!  Space Farmers is a two players ( only ) co-op isometric puzzle shooter thingy with cute and nice graphics ( subjective opinion ) and mindblowing music to boot ( completely objective! critics can bend over! ). No single player campaign and if you have a third friend ( who has the time for that? ) you'll need to ditch him/her - this is two players and two players only. The greatest thing about Space Farmers is that there isn't that much farming - it's truly co-operative puzzles.   'Like Portal 2?'  you ask.   'F*** Portal 2!'  I say. When it comes to co-operative puzzle games P2 has nothing to say against Space Farmers. An example; at one point you and your buddy are walking down separate corridors. He (or she, who's judging?) has a pair of blue goggles, you have a pair of red goggles. You see all the red enemies but can't see the blue and vice versa. You really need to communicate to come out of that place alive!  In all respects; but especially if you're searching for a two players (online or local) co-op puzzle game - this is it! IT IS IT!
This is very fun as long as you have a second player otherwise its unplayable by urself

Space Farmers is a co-op only game with lots of fun, can play via lan, internet or local co-op. At the start of a session you get a total of 5 different missions picked randomly to play in with your friend, once you finish that serie of levels you can go for another set of levels hoping to find a game you haven't played before ,or do some really fun challenging arena battles. Each level presents a unique and fun way to complete the level and to kill your friend in humorous ways, like when you have to carry a bomb hat and you decide to steal your friends clock making his hat explode. For 10 dollars the game is a little expensive but if you find it during a sale and have a friend to play with then it's a must buy, since it can only be played in co-op due to the nature of the levels wait for 3$ or less or bundle like i did.
The game i can say is fun.

As a farmer myself, I liked the idea of the game and thought it looked fun. Sadly I wasnt able to play co-op with my pal. We tried everything that we could. It was very buggy and glitchy in both Windows and Linux. I am going to have to say no untill I can get a better online experience.
Thankfully I only paid $3 for this thing. I'm hoping this gets better, but the first impressions were not great. It feels like a bad mobile game ported to PC. It's just not fun.

Amazing game! Got all the achivements and had a lot of fun! But if you don't have friends I don't recommend getting this game because it is all about TEAMWORK!!!!!!!!!!!! :)    PS: Some achivements are glitched and were hard to get. Ex: Survivors

Dont get this game if you want to play with a friend... You will never be able to connect to each other (even after patch 1.5d). My friend and I have tried to play together for about half an hour and it still wont let us connet to each other. Dont get this game... For the sake of your time... Just dont...

My Grandfather smoked his whole life. I was about 10 years old when my mother said to him, 'If you ever want to see your grandchildren graduate, you have to stop immediately.' Tears welled up in his eyes when he realized what exactly was at stake. He gave it up immediately. Three years later he died of lung cancer. It was really sad and destroyed me. My mother said to me- 'Don't ever smoke. Please don't put your family through what your Grandfather put us through.' I agreed. At 28, I have never touched a cigarette. I must say, I feel a very slight sense of regret for never having done it, because this game gave me cancer anyway.

To start of this game is a joke, everything about it is broken. Just look at the economy system: turnips. Why the ♥♥♥♥ is it turnips and not something else that made sense. Weak point I know, calling it a joke would not be quite correct. It's a quick cash and grab for the develepors tricking people into buying it. Why do I say that? The game is filled with bugs and bad develepment. You can walk through walls, fall through the map and its so much more thats wrong with it. By the amount of bugs that is in this I am suprised this is not in alpha still. HRMF quick cash grab for the develepors.  This is the biggest waste of money I have ever spent, and that says alot because a friend gave it to me and said it would be 'fun'. This game... no not a game, some quick bucks for the develpors. It might attract some 7 year olds, that would have as much fun bashing each other with ♥♥♥♥ing rocks. Its just ♥♥♥♥, just ♥♥♥♥ing horrible. I'll give it one thing though, me and my friend had some 'fun' abusing the bugs and finding spots in maps where you just fell off randomly, plumming to your lonely virgin doom, other than that it was just crying because the game was way to buggy for us to complete a level or the fact that enemys glitched out so the killed us when we were behind walls. I belive I would have found more 'fun' watching holocaust documentarys, hey atleast I would have been ENTERTAINED then, other than just looking at my screen and considering the meaning of life while we failed one more mission or picked up 3 more turnips. It puts a shame to the Indie industry this pice of garbage was marketing itself like something good, like something people would have such a great time with. And it worked, people bought this ♥♥♥♥, wasted money. Cheeky lucky develepors made alot on it.   The only way you will find any sort of fun in this is: if you are a child, if you are a child molester, if you are mentally unstable and find ♥♥♥♥ and fart jokes HILLARIUS or if you are a pice of ♥♥♥♥ that find everything funny if you have friends to do it with, like me. But it was not funny, it was a pain. This game became a meme in the friendship i had with the lad, not because it was like: oh yeah lets do like we did in space farmers. Oh no it was like: Hey there Spidur why dont we complete all of the achivements on space farmers, followed by both of us lauging before we went back into the holes we came from.  To sum up please do not buy this game, what you are doing by buying this game is not only wasting your money. You would be supporting the quick cash and grab game industry. You would be apart of this cancerous community. Good luck anyhow this review has been way too long on a game like this.
this game is very fun and interesting

A co-op game where working together is not an option, it's a requirement. Interesting level designs that will challenge you... and may have you yelling unnecessary insults to your friends. Their actions can easily get you killed, while at the same time, their lives are in your hands.  Add to that, the chibi graphics, clever level design, square pigs, cow-fart-propelled-ships, and a developer who is actively developing free content.  Why are you still reading this, BUY THE GAME! BUY A GIFT COPY! RUIN YOUR FRIENDSHIP! IN SPAAAAAACCCEEEE!!!!

Got given this game as a gift and I gotta admit I've loved playing every minute of it. Many hours of fun filled with laughs and rage.  From feeding a robotic dinosaur with pies to igniting cow farts with a flare gun. You won't regret buying this game is all I can say. :')   Just be careful your gaming partner doesn't kill you with their lazer gun. -.-

Great game for you and a friend, amazing game mechanics I have never seen before, and has great replay value. 10/10 would collect turnips again!

At first, I just hated this game, before I understood how its mechanics work. It is ABSOLUTELY GREAT co-op fun, for your friends, kids, anyone. This game is in fact a great training in co-operation. I am playing it with my almost 6yo son and we have A LOT of fun. Sure, there are some much harder to beat levels, but overall... I higly recomment this game. GOOD JOB !
